title: If You Guys aren't Playing Sion Support, stop what your doing and listen.
body: This shiz is straight up strong as fudge. You max e for incredibly strong poke in lane, and since most people use {{champion:14}}  for his ult and knock-up (which don't require gold to be useful), you don't have to worry about not having farm (though if you go {{item:3302}}  you can at least get some minions) Start spamming {{champion:14}} support today!

replies.body: Old Sion support yeah. Against good players they'll juke your abilities and make you useless.
Stop what you're* doing and go back to school where you'll learn proper English along with decent grammar.
And this is definitely a valid argument against the topic.
I wasn't arguing it, Sion has a ridiculously strong laning phase and brings a lot of utility and mid-late game tankiness to the table. OP just has terrible grammar.

I see. 

I don't seem to agree with the point. Sion could be really squishy early game. With the harasses from the enemy ADC and support, Sion could be shredded down easily before being able to poke back.

his E has a long range coupled with a relatively harsh slow. It's no Morgana Q, but it also travels a lot faster and keeps him at a safe range.
His W is a shield relative to health, that still scales with minion deaths anyways.
Kinda hard to poke down a guy who has a longer range harass pre-6 than most ADCs and supports and a shield to boot.
Any two people who are on the same page can make any combination of two champions work in bot lane.
So this is why he is getting nerfed. Lol
I've tried this before. I agree it is pretty strong, however; an adc gets progressively stronger over time and they will eventually shred you.
